tasks_completed: T0.2: Configure font setup with typography scale

theme_decisions.design_philosophy: Premium light theme with high contrast dark text for character sheet implementation

backgrounds.rationale: Multiple shades of parchment create subtle depth hierarchy without heavy shadows

text.rationale: All text colors meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1+), primary and emerald exceed AAA (7:1+)

accents.rationale: Emerald represents growth/progress, Gold for ornaments (decorative only, never body text)

borders.rationale: Semi-transparent gold borders allow parchment warmth to bleed through

font_families.serif: Playfair Display, Cormorant Garamond, Georgia, serif
font_families.rationale: Serif for headlines (elegant, mystical), Sans for body (readable, modern)

type_scale.rationale: Fluid scale with generous line-heights for comfort during stat comparison

stat_display_scale.rationale: Equal-width digits prevent layout shift during animations

font_weights.rationale: Avoid bold (700) to maintain elegant aesthetic

opentype_features.rationale: Tabular for stats (alignment), ligatures for serif elegance

transitions.rationale: Custom easing for smooth, premium-feeling animations

delta_animations.rationale: Magnitude-based duration for perceptible stat changes

accessibility.prefers_reduced_motion: All animations â‰¤250ms, no motion effects
accessibility.rationale: Respect user preferences, exceed minimum requirements

spacing_system.rationale: All spacing is multiple of 4px for consistent rhythm

contrast_validation.critical_rule: accent_gold (#D4AF37) NEVER used for body text - decorative only

integration_notes.coexistence: Light-Grimoire coexists with Modern Alchemy (dark theme)
integration_notes.theme_scope: Use .theme-light-grimoire class to apply light theme to containers

next_phase_dependencies.phase_1: Visual Design Blueprint - uses these tokens for Figma/design specs
next_phase_dependencies.token_namespace: All tokens prefixed with --lg- to avoid conflicts

design_rationale.light_theme_choice: Creates 'sacred space' distinction from dark quiz pages - like opening an illuminated manuscript
design_rationale.parchment_palette: Evokes grimoires, sacred texts, premium handcrafted feel
design_rationale.high_contrast: Dense stat tables benefit from dark text on light backgrounds

future_extensibility.multi_language: Typography system can expand font subsets if needed

accessibility_commitments.wcag_level: AA minimum (4.5:1), AAA achieved for primary text (13.5:1)

coordination_metadata.agent_handoff: Phase 1 agents should read this file for design decisions
